title: Satirica: An Anthology of Satirical Speculative Fiction
description: Anthology of speculative satire.Contributing authors are:Joshua AllenRJ AstrucJason K ChapmanGary CubaLawrence R DagstineJohn Parke DavisSteven J DinesDudgeonVictor GianniniRoger HallerBill HousleyDan KopcowDan MarcusPaul ManneringThomas L MartinEdward MorrisMike PhilbinAnden SharpKevin SpiessDavid Thorpe
author: Dudgeon
